Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand are a win away from winning their ongoing five-match T20I series against Pakistan.
Kane Williamson has been ruled out of the remainder of the series because of a hamstring injury.
Williamson was expected to skip the third T20I to be played in Dunedin with the South Africa Test series at home approaching.
Tim Seifert is expected to replace Williamson in the playing XI.
Pakistan are now fighting to keep the series alive after losing the first two contests.
Another defeat will extend Pakistan's wait for a first T20I series win since 2022.
The contest will be played in Dunedin which has traditionally been batting friendly.
